content.text:
## Three Options:

1. **Extract & Integrate** - Take the working severity component from the demo and properly integrate it into index.html
2. **Clean Rewrite** - Start fresh with a cleaner implementation based on the demo's successful patterns  
3. **Continue Previous Work** - Pick up where the last thread left off and fix remaining issues

**Going with Option 1** - This will get you the best result fastest since the demo is already 95% correct.

Let me implement this by extracting the severity component styles and integrating them properly into the index.html:

edits.new_string: <!-- Adobe Fonts for Jaf Bernino Sans -->

edits.old_string:
<!-- Adobe Fonts for Jaf Bernino Sans -->
    
    <!-- VioVerse Refactor Styles -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/refactor-ui.css">
edits.new_string:
<!-- Adobe Fonts for Jaf Bernino Sans -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/qes3lop.css">
    
    <!-- VioVerse Refactor Styles -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/refactor-ui.css">
    
    <style>
        /* Severity Summary Component Styles */
        .severity-summary-component {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 24px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-header {
            font-family: "jaf-bernino-sans-comp", sans-serif;
            font-weight: 800;
            font-style: normal;
            font-size: 30pt;
            color: rgba(37, 53, 65, 0.9);
            margin-bottom: 7px;
            text-transform: lowercase;
            letter-spacing: -0.02em;
            width: 100%;
            text-align: left;
            transition: opacity 300ms ease;
        }
        
        /* Toggle button for severity summary */
        .severity-summary-toggle {
            position: absolute;
            right: 20px;
            top: 30px;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: none;
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            z-index: 10;
            transition: all 300ms ease;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-toggle svg {
            color: #A8AEB3;
            width: 32px;
            height: 32px;
            transition: all 300ms ease;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-toggle:hover svg {
            color: #F26419;
        }
        
        /* Severity boxes row */
        .severity-boxes-row {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .severity-box {
            width: 123px;
            height: 98px;
            background-color: #e3e2e1;
            border: 1px solid white;
            border-radius: 32px;
            box-shadow: 1px 3px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .severity-label {
            position: absolute;
            top: 6px;
            width: 110px;
            height: 34px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 9.6pt;
            color: rgba(37, 53, 65, 0.9);
            text-align: center;
            line-height: 1.2;
        }
        
        .dot-counter-group {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 11px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 2px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
        }
        
        .badge-dot {
            width: 38px;
            height: 38px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .badge-dot svg {
            color: white !important;
            stroke: white !important;
            fill: none !important;
            width: 28px !important;
            height: 28px !important;
            display: block;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .severity-counter {
            font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 33.5pt;
            color: rgba(37, 53, 65, 0.9);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            line-height: 1;
            min-width: 36px;
            position: relative;
            top: 2px;
        }
        
        /* Tighter letter spacing for 3-digit numbers */
        .severity-counter.three-digits {
            letter-spacing: -0.05em;
        }
        
        /* High Severity */
        .severity-high .badge-dot {
            background-color: #FF0000;
        }
        
        /* Shield-x icon: 20% larger */
        .severity-high .badge-dot svg {
            width: 33.6px !important;
            height: 33.6px !important;
        }
        
        /* Medium Severity */
        .severity-medium .badge-dot {
            background-color: #F26419;
        }
        
        /* Triangle-alert icon: 10% larger and moved up 2.3px */
        .severity-medium .badge-dot svg {
            position: relative;
            top: -2.3px;
            width: 30.8px !important;
            height: 30.8px !important;
        }
        
        /* Low Severity */
        .severity-low .badge-dot {
            background-color: #F2B919;
        }
        
        /* Circle-alert icon: 20% larger */
        .severity-low .badge-dot svg {
            width: 33.6px !important;
            height: 33.6px !important;
        }
        
        /* Collapsible behavior */
        .severity-summary-content {
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 300ms ease;
            transform-origin: top;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-content {
            height: 0;
            opacity: 0;
            transform: scaleY(0);
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-toggle {
            top: 12px;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-toggle svg {
            width: 12px !important;
            height: 12px !important;
            stroke-width: 3 !important;
        }
        
        /* Collapsed label */
        .severity-summary-collapsed-label {
            position: absolute;
            left: 24px;
            top: 12px;
            font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
            font-weight: 400;
            font-size: 8pt;
            color: rgba(37, 53, 65, 0.9);
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
            transition: all 300ms ease;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-collapsed-label:hover {
            color: #F26419;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-collapsed-label {
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: auto;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-header {
            opacity: 0;
        }
    </style>

<!-- Lucide Icons -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js"></script>

    <!-- VioVerse Refactor Styles -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/refactor-ui.css">
    
    <style>
        /* Severity Summary Component Styles */
        .severity-summary-component {
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 24px;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-header {
            font-family: "jaf-bernino-sans-comp", sans-serif;
            font-weight: 800;
            font-style: normal;
            font-size: 30pt;
            color: rgba(37, 53, 65, 0.9);
            margin-bottom: 7px;
            text-transform: lowercase;
            letter-spacing: -0.02em;
            width: 100%;
            text-align: left;
            transition: opacity 300ms ease;
        }
        
        /* Toggle button for severity summary */
        .severity-summary-toggle {
            position: absolute;
            right: 20px;
            top: 30px;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: none;
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            z-index: 10;
            transition: all 300ms ease;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-toggle svg {
            color: #A8AEB3;
            width: 32px;
            height: 32px;
            transition: all 300ms ease;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-toggle:hover svg {
            color: #F26419;
        }
        
        /* Severity boxes row */
        .severity-boxes-row {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .severity-box {
            width: 123px;
            height: 98px;
            background-color: #e3e2e1;
            border: 1px solid white;
            border-radius: 32px;
            box-shadow: 1px 3px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .severity-label {
            position: absolute;
            top: 6px;
            width: 110px;
            height: 34px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 9.6pt;
            color: rgba(37, 53, 65, 0.9);
            text-align: center;
            line-height: 1.2;
        }
        
        .dot-counter-group {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 11px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 2px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
        }
        
        .badge-dot {
            width: 38px;
            height: 38px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }
        
        .badge-dot svg {
            color: white !important;
            stroke: white !important;
            fill: none !important;
            width: 28px !important;
            height: 28px !important;
            display: block;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .severity-counter {
            font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 33.5pt;
            color: rgba(37, 53, 65, 0.9);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            line-height: 1;
            min-width: 36px;
            position: relative;
            top: 2px;
        }
        
        /* Tighter letter spacing for 3-digit numbers */
        .severity-counter.three-digits {
            letter-spacing: -0.05em;
        }
        
        /* High Severity */
        .severity-high .badge-dot {
            background-color: #FF0000;
        }
        
        /* Shield-x icon: 20% larger */
        .severity-high .badge-dot svg {
            width: 33.6px !important;
            height: 33.6px !important;
        }
        
        /* Medium Severity */
        .severity-medium .badge-dot {
            background-color: #F26419;
        }
        
        /* Triangle-alert icon: 10% larger and moved up 2.3px */
        .severity-medium .badge-dot svg {
            position: relative;
            top: -2.3px;
            width: 30.8px !important;
            height: 30.8px !important;
        }
        
        /* Low Severity */
        .severity-low .badge-dot {
            background-color: #F2B919;
        }
        
        /* Circle-alert icon: 20% larger */
        .severity-low .badge-dot svg {
            width: 33.6px !important;
            height: 33.6px !important;
        }
        
        /* Collapsible behavior */
        .severity-summary-content {
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 300ms ease;
            transform-origin: top;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-content {
            height: 0;
            opacity: 0;
            transform: scaleY(0);
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-toggle {
            top: 12px;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-toggle svg {
            width: 12px !important;
            height: 12px !important;
            stroke-width: 3 !important;
        }
        
        /* Collapsed label */
        .severity-summary-collapsed-label {
            position: absolute;
            left: 24px;
            top: 12px;
            font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
            font-weight: 400;
            font-size: 8pt;
            color: rgba(37, 53, 65, 0.9);
            opacity: 0;
            pointer-events: none;
            transition: all 300ms ease;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-collapsed-label:hover {
            color: #F26419;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-collapsed-label {
            opacity: 1;
            pointer-events: auto;
        }
        
        .severity-summary-component.collapsed .severity-summary-header {
            opacity: 0;
        }
    </style>
